title: ISic001169. Funerary inscription to Attikon
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΑΤΤΙΚΩΝ
2Α.ΑΘΙΝΟΥ
3ΧΑΙΡΕ

Apparatus criticus

Text from autopsy; Previous editions do not recognise the gamma on line 2 as being almost entirely obscured

English translation

Attikon, son of Agathinos, farewell.

commentary

The name Attikon is unique. The name Agathinos, is not particularly frequent, and this is its first attestation in Sicily.

bibliography

  • 8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001397
  • Manni Piraino 1971 186 no.2 tav.55.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001774
